Game Module¶

class game.Game(debug: bool = True)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Game class represents the core game loop and manages the game’s state and flow.

running¶

A flag indicating whether the game is currently running.

Type:

bool

weapon¶

The currently selected weapon in the game.

Type:

Weapon

debug¶

A flag indicating whether debug mode is enabled.

Type:

bool

go_combat()[source]¶
go_home() → Home_menu[source]¶
main_loop() → None[source]¶

The main game loop that keeps the game running until the running flag is set to False. It clears the terminal, runs the current menu, and handles the chosen action. If debug mode is enabled, it pauses execution to allow for debugging.
